title: Strengthening Web Development Practical Competencies: Online Socioconstructivist Pedagogy for Creative Design Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can convert factual, procedural, and conceptual knowledge into visual and spatial representations to share in a VR simulation environment
Through collaborative design activities with peers, learners can propose creative solutions to complex social problems
Learners can record metacognitive reflections on the design process in an online platform and derive improvement plans incorporating feedback
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
